SEARCH
Package catan.ceng.catanui.entities

Class CatanPlayer

java.lang.Object
catan.ceng.catanui.entities.CatanPlayer
public class CatanPlayer extends Object
The CatanPlayer class represents a player in the game of Catan. It includes information about the player's name, AI status, color, score, resources, roads, settlements, cities, and methods for building roads, settlements, and cities, as well as simulating an AI player's turn.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Catan player with the specified name, AI status, and color.
